Project description

tox

tox aims to automate and standardize testing in Python. It is part of a larger vision of easing the packaging, testingand release process of Python software (alongside pytest anddevpi).

tox is a generic virtual environment management and test command line tool you can use for:

  • checking your package builds and installs correctly under different environments (such as different Pythonimplementations, versions or installation dependencies),
  • running your tests in each of the environments with the test tool of choice,
  • acting as a frontend to continuous integration servers, greatly reducing boilerplate and merging CI and shell-basedtesting.

Please read our user guide for an example and more detailedintroduction, or watch this YouTube video that presents the problem spaceand how tox solves it.
